text: Soon-Yi Previn (, Oh Soon-hee, ; born October 8, 1970) is the adopted daughter of actress Mia Farrow and musician Andr√© Previn, and the wife of filmmaker Woody Allen. Soon-Yi Previn is known for her relationship with Allen, who was her adoptive mother's boyfriend for over 10 years. Previn's relationship with Allen became national news in 1992. In 1992, Previn said that Farrow had physically abused her. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:People from New York City Category:People from Seoul Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American adoptees Category:Drew University alumni
title: Soon-Yi Previn
